inputs.summary: Spec/context snapshot updated 2025-10-17 detailing secrets scanner rollout, Proton scaffolding, OAuth scope, and current architecture claims.
Architect checklist at repo root reporting 85% completion with Application, GuardSuite, Infra, and AI items still unchecked.
Docs-site mirror of the checklist (85% complete; 55 done / 10 remaining with 2 active, 8 deferred).

evidence.detail: Static Analyst Dashboard route referencing deterministic metadata.
Evidence cards for risk, retrieval, and drift snapshots.
Jest test ensuring dashboard sections render.
Route wrapper for the evidence feed placeholder.
Static JSON evidence payloads with priority badges.
Spec document describing the evidence envelope and sample payloads.
CDK app composes networking, data, ML, security, compliance, and budget stacks per environment.
Typed ConfigLoader enforces environment-aware settings and secret indirection.
Budget stack implements per-environment cost guardrails.
Hot-swappable model loader with stub fallback for cost control.
pgvector-backed retrieval abstraction aligning with spec.
Deterministic spot-check harness producing artifacts referenced in docs.

sections.name: AWS Cloud Foundation

evidence.detail: Segmented VPC and networking primitives consumed by domain stacks.
Centralized secrets provisioning with deterministic naming.
GuardDuty, Security Hub, Detective, Config activation.

sections.notes: Multi-region failover rehearsal (SC-INFRA-STACK-002) not implemented anywhere in repo.

sections.name: AI Core Development

evidence.detail: Loader abstraction with model swap + quantization hooks.
Documented benchmark artifacts.

gaps: No multi-agent orchestration, prompt governance registry, approval workflow, or automated hallucination/toxicity evaluation loop present.

sections.name: Application Layer & Integration

evidence.detail: Analyst dashboard summary route satisfying SC-APP-UI-001.
Evidence feed route satisfying SC-APP-UI-002.
Route-level Jest coverage for dashboard + evidence feed.
Demo FastAPI endpoints (vertical slice) not yet wired to dashboard.

gaps: No public API surface powering the dashboard; SC-APP-PUBLIC-API-001/002/003 remain open.

sections.name: GuardSuite Integration Layer

evidence.detail: High-level integration narrative.
Artifact crosswalk linking claims to evidence.

gaps: GuardSuite CLI contract, model governance integration, and docs parity artifacts absent.

sections.name: Security & Governance

evidence.detail: Node-based secrets scanner invoked by commit helper.
Latest scanner output shipped with repo.
Documented risk & mitigation baseline.

gaps: No SBOM generation/signing pipeline or automated IAM access review cadence implemented.

evidence.detail: Narrative covering the demo workflow.
Living checklist with styling + automation note.
Published benchmark evidence referenced by UI.

open_items.detail: No high-fidelity UX or chart implementations exist beyond static cards.
Dashboard lacks a public API surface; only demo endpoints exist in api/app.py.
No authentication model for public dashboard API documented or implemented.
Evidence/query pipeline not wired into the dashboard or API layer.
GuardSuite documentation parity missing beyond high-level notes.
No GuardSuite CLI contract or schema implemented.
No GuardSuite model governance integration artifacts in repo.
No SBOM generation or signing pipeline in scripts or CI.
No automated IAM access review cadence implemented.
Approval workflow + safety rail logic not implemented.
No automated relevance drift monitoring loop beyond manual reports.

risks.detail: Checklist still flags SC-APP-UI-001/002 as incomplete even though code + tests exist; may cause duplicated instructions.
UI finalization and public API work remain unstarted, blocking downstream evidence ingest and GuardSuite integrations.
CLI contract, docs parity, and model governance hooks absent; integration timeline uncertain.
SBOM pipeline and IAM review cadence not implemented, leaving security claims unproven.
Multi-agent, prompt governance, approval workflow, and drift monitoring workstreams unscheduled.

recommendations: Update both checklists to mark SC-APP-UI-001 and SC-APP-UI-002 complete with links to dashboard routes, EvidenceFeed component, docs, and Jest tests.
Prioritize SC-APP-UI-003 and the SC-APP-PUBLIC-API-* items so that dashboard data pipelines have a real contract.
Add GuardSuite CLI/model governance stubs (schema + docs) to unblock integration sequencing.
Introduce deterministic SBOM generation/signing and IAM access review automation (nox session + CI wiring).
Plan and staff the AI governance tranche (multi-agent orchestration, prompt registry, approval workflow, drift monitoring).

tests_verified.description: Jest test covering dashboard summary and evidence feed rendering.
